text: Karl-Erik Nilsson (4 January 1922 â€“ 14 December 2017) was a Swedish light- heawyweight (-87 kg) Greco-Roman wrestler. He competed at the 1948, 1952 and 1956 Olympics and won one gold and two bronze medals. He won another bronze medal at the 1955 World Wrestling Championships.Karl-Erik Nilsson. Swedish Olympic CommitteeKarl-Erik Nilsson . sports-reference.com He was born in Stehag, Sweden.
